name: Luce squishable
tagline: Flatten Luce's lua classes into one file
body:
===============
Luce Squishable
===============
--------------------------------------------------
Squishes Luce's lua classes into one portable file
--------------------------------------------------

Usage
=====

    make [LUCE_SOURCES=<path_to_luce_sources>, default: ../luce]

Output
------
    
a flatly squished ``luce.lua``.

License
=======

Luce is licensed under the terms of the [GPLv3](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html)
with some part being [AGPLv3](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.html)
for all open source applications.

To release close-source applications with [Luce/Embedded](https://github.com/peersuasive/luce_embeddable) and/or [Luce](https://github.com/peersuasive/luce), please contact us at contact@peersuasive.com

Luce is (c) 2014, Peersuasive Technologies

``squish`` is is the work of Metthew Wild (who is also the creator of [Prosody](https://prosody.im/), among many other things)

Sources and legal informations can be found at [squish](http://matthewwild.co.uk/projects/squish/home)

Squish is (C) 2009-2010 Matthew Wild.
